EmailTemplate.name: Custom Benefit Plan is DMHC Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Custom Benefit Plan is DMHC Approved - Employer Name: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Plan_Related_to_Account__c}/DBA: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Custom Plan Request {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Name} has been approved by the DMHC. Final documents are now available in the {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Plan_Related_to_Account__c}/DBA: {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.DBA__c}, {!Custom_Benefit_Plan__c.Employer_Type__c} documents folder. Please notify the Broker/Employer Group and send the updated documents.
Thank you.
